this series and specifically this game is one of the best games i have played. The story is interesting, and you can probably replay this 5 times and still find new things. The game play mechanics are so interesting, and the physics based combat and puzzles are really fun. For an old game this still holds to the test of time. i highly reccomend this game.
After all of these years, still a great game to come back to.
Finally got to play this legend on my own computer
Just got into playing half-life 2. I bet the creators are hard at work on 3.
